content.raw:
To the best of my knowledge, `enableGroundTruth` does not turn all sensor measurements to truth but it does enable the transform from `<world_name>` to `<vehicle_name>` to be published on `/<vehicle_name>/pose`.  I just checked that this occurs only when `enableGroundTruth:=true`.  Truth data may be published in other forms but I am unaware of them at the moment.

I just tested on `simple_urban_03` and the transform noted above did _seem_ to correctly track well beyond the starting tile into other zones.  I did not check for scale.  Orientation seemed correct.  The transform I monitored in RViz during this teleop test was the `simple_urban_03->/alpha` transform.
